body:
SPOILER ALERT IN COMMENTS TURN BACK NOW

A long review to distract you: wow. Just wow. It's perfection. Kiyo and even Gudao are drawn beautifully, but esp. Kiyo. Her heart-pupils, her expressions, her dialogue are all great, but she LOOKS young. If it weren't for the blurred out 2, it'd be very very difficult to tell she was a loli at all. Too bad it's missing some tags. My main complaint: WORDS CAN NOT DESCRIBE HOW BADLY I DESIRE THIS BEAUTY TO BE UNCENSORED (and even then I almost kissed Kiyo's pussy on my screen)... but I'll be content for now. 9/10 for subpar climax. All the other panels are phenomenal.
I'm a little bit confused, she have 12; but god damn, THIS WAS FUCKING HOT AF
Full color of our favorite dragon yandere, yes please.
